faq.question: How do I create a post?
answer: Click the corresponding bottom on the dashboard
Fill all the required fields in the post page (including the title/type/abstract/content/tags)
Upload logo image for your post by choosing the corresponding file
Click the 'Submit' button to submit your post (you can click the 'clear' button if you fill something wrong)
Click Home to return to the dashboard.

faq.question: How do I delete/edit a post?
answer: Check the list of post you have created
Click the post for which you want to delete/edit
Fill and submit the form just like what you did when you created it
There are more details you can fill when you edit the post than when you created it (including the telephone/domain name/paypal email/facebook url/twitter url/google url/image)
Click Home to return to the dashboard.

faq.question: How do I approve a post?
answer: Check the list of post and choose the one you want to approve. It will include all the details about this post
Click the corresponding button ('Approve Post!') to approve the post
Click Home to return to the dashboard.

faq.question: How do I update my account details?
answer: Click the corresponding link ('Edit details/Edit Styles') on the left of the dashboard
Choose an option
Edit the details
Click the 'Submit' button to submit your update
Click Home to return to the dashboard.

faq.question: Where can I find some statistics information about my charity?
answer: Click the corresponding link ('Analytics') on the left of the dashboard.

faq.question: How do I get to my charity site?
answer: Click the corresponding link ('My charity') on the left of the dashboard.
